analysis: The statement claims that the Star Wars system (SDI) will 'add a dangerous new escalation' to the arms race. While the speaker frames this as a causal relationship, there is no explicit evidence provided to support the direct link between the SDI and the escalation. The argument assumes that the SDI inherently causes escalation without addressing alternative explanations or intermediate steps. This aligns with the definition of False Cause (3), as it misinterprets a correlation (SDI being part of the arms race) as a direct causal relationship without sufficient justification.
